description: Constructed Azure Synapse Pipelines to facilitate the seamless transfer of data from on-premises data systems to Azure Data Lake Storage.
Worked on PySpark Notebooks, Microsoft Fabric Created insightful data visualization reports with Power BI.

Conducted in-depth analysis of large language models, specifically ChatGPT, on various mental health datasets sourced from Reddit and proposed different prompting strategies and fine-tuning to increase the accuracy of automated mental health analysis tasks by 20%.
